text-title: All the news about amateur football
text-description: We are pasionate about football: We like to play, we like to watch it. Why should we just care about what proffesional footballers do? Everyone can play football!
Follow our site and you will be up to date about everything that happens in the amateur football scene.
We have been organizing leagues and playing in amateur teams for years! It's time to let the world know about our work
text-examples-description: 6 teams playing agains each other every other week. Since 2001!
Open to everyone to signup! all the matches happens in the same weekend
We are in contact with other amateur football associations to make this happen!
text-contact: Come to play some footie with us! call us (123) 444–5678 or use the form below.
